citation_details.title: Sensing local field potentials with a directional and scalable depth electrode array
citation_details.author: AM Abrego, W Khan, CE Wright, MR Islam
citation_details.abstract: Objective. A variety of electrophysiology tools are available to the neurosurgeon for diagnosis,  functional therapy, and neural prosthetics. However, no tool can currently address these
